script.title: DV360 To Storage
script.description: Move existing DV360 report into a Storage bucket.
instructions: Specify either report name or report id to move a report.
The most recent valid file will be moved to the bucket.

field.name: dbm_report_id
field.description: DV360 report ID given in UI, not needed if name used.

field.name: dbm_report_name
field.description: Name of report, not needed if ID used.

field.name: dbm_path
field.description: Path and filename to write to.
